That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Life!

boardgame.description: He who laughs last, laughs best. The board of this roll and move game is made of cards with number values from -10 to +8. The last piece to leave each card (each player has several pieces) must take the card. In the end, the player with most points (or least negative points) wins the game. The game has very few rules and lots of luck._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

My late husband was an avid board gamer, if his game had been played, he made sure there was no food or drink around his games. He stored them neatly and usually well organized. He loved collecting games almost as much as he loved playing them. I am looking to make sure they go to good homes where they will be will taken care of. Thank you!

This is Kiesling and Kramer in family game mode: the rules might be simpler, but the game offers an entertaining challenge. By moving along the line of tiles players try to collect as many plus and fortune cards as possible, while avoiding the minus cards. The fortune cards are particularly important because they can convert minus cards into plus cards. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s good fun. This is a secondhand copy in excellent condition apart from a little wear on the box corners. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £10.00 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £10.38 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £8.65 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £14.10 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £13.35 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
